entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near noon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 5 in the evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 17 February 2023
